text: Avarkalukku munnar nam ettanaiyo talaimuraiyinarai alittirukkirom enpatai avarkal parkkavillaiya? Pumiyil nam unkalukku ceytu tarata vacatikalaiyellam avarkalukkuc ceytu kotuttiruntom; avarkal mitu nam vanam tarai taraiyaka malai peyyumaru ceytu, avarkalukkuk kile arukal celittotumpatic ceytom; piraku avarkalin pavankalin karanattal avarkalai alittu vittom; avarkalukkup pin veru talaimuraikalai untakkinom
